creator: nico@emutex.com
text:
Created attachment 29404
Patch to ab.c that enables both new protocols

TLS 1.1 and 1.2 support has been added to the apache benchmark tool. 
These protocols will be available through the same command line parameter [-f] as the other protocols. These changes will not affect the existent functionality.

 * -f TLS1.1 for using the TLS 1.1 protocol
 * -f TLS1.2 for using the TLS 1.2 protocol

OpenSSL 1.0.1 or higher is required. If not available, these protocols won't be available.

creator: asfbugz@velox.ch
text: Thanks, slightly amended and committed in r1395225. Proposed for backporting to 2.4.x/2.2.x.

creator: asfbugz@velox.ch
text: For the sake of reference: the revisions were r1400946 (for 2.4) and r1445104 (for 2.2).
